meanings.definition: Consisting of, containing, or resembling clay
meanings.sent1: The potter used argillaceous soil to make his clay pots.
meanings.sent2: The argillaceous nature of the soil made it perfect for molding into shapes.
meanings.sent3: The children had a messy argillaceous playdate with clay sculptures everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her argillaceous hands were evidence of a day spent working with clay.
meanings.sent5: The artist's argillaceous creations were admired for their intricate details.
